tool_description: Glasshat generates customised and prioritised Digital Marketing recommendations that tell you exactly what you need to focus on to get tangible results that matter to you. Our proprietary software also reviews your online competition to customise a plan that gets the best results for your website and conversions for you. This set of public API endpoints control the majority of the features enjoyed inside our application.
name: Glasshat
title: Glasshat

api_list.name: /project/{project_id}/update (Update project)

required_parameters.name: project_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the project to retrieve details.

api_list.name: /project/create (Create project)
/client/{client_id}/delete (Delete client)

required_parameters.name: client_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the client to retrieve details.

api_list.name: /task/{task_id}/update (Update action task)
api_list.description: Change action task status. Mark an action as planned, finished, and/or declined.

required_parameters.name: task_id
required_parameters.description: ID of task action to retrieve details.

api_list.name: /client/create (Create client)
api_list.description: Create a new client under the Glasshat account. Note an error will be returned if you've reached the maximum number of clients allowed for your Glasshat account.

api_list.name: /project/{project_id}/delete (Delete project)

required_parameters.name: project_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the project to retrieve details.

api_list.name: /client/{client_id}/update (Update client)

required_parameters.name: client_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the client to retrieve details.
